price: Yã kũ waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni! Ku riƙi shirinku* sa'an nan ku fitar da hari jama'a, jama'a ko ku fitar da yaƙi gaba ɗaya.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ خُذُواْ حِذۡرَكُمۡ فَٱنفِرُواْ ثُبَاتٍ أَوِ ٱنفِرُواْ جَمِيعٗا
footnotes: * Bã ya halatta Musulmi su zauna bãbu tattalin yãƙi da fitar da yãki ko hari a kan maƙiyansu, saboda abin da ke cikin wannan ãyar ta 71.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
